titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning popish perjurers in an addresse to the Honorable the Commons of England in Parliament assembled at Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Beane, Richard.

notesStmt.note: "I do own myself to be the authour of this discourse concerning popish perjuries ... and written by my own hand" (p. [1]) signed: Ric. Beane.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
